mapper.update: update gd_account set businessid = #{businessid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phoneNo = #{phoneno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, businessid, company, createTime, createby, deleted, `name`, `password`, phoneNo, `state`, username from gd_account where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
